text: I find it's especially important among freelance writers to talk among themselves about who is paying them what.
author: alxhuls

text: Leave me alone, Google! I will use Inbox by Gmail until the last possible moment before you pry it from my hands.
author: alxhuls

text: Oh, and I also pair it with this, FWIW https://www.amazon.ca/Sony-ICDUX560BLK-IC-Voice-Recorder/dp/B01FWNSXJO/ref=sr_1_3?keywords=sony+recorder&qid=1552996996&s=gateway&sr=8-3 …
author: alxhuls

text: If you haven't yet read this piece, correct that now. It's fantastic. The nomination is very much deserved.
author: alxhuls

text: That means a lot coming from you, so many thanks for reading and sharing!
author: alxhuls

text: I've been listening to @longformpodcast for years. I check the @longform website several times a day. I bought a T-shirt of theirs when it became available. I can't overstate what a moment it is to see that today they highlighted my true crime feature about a STAR WARS toy heist
author: alxhuls

text: Must have been a really good mediation session to evoke that title.
author: alxhuls
